attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I/we as a group have overwhelming proof of Masonic harassment/corruption/injustice. We cannot take our evidence to their Masonic system, yet. Secrecy = Lies. In the meantime, why can't we have a public register of Freemasons? Something to hide? you bet ! The practice of this evil must be banned.  Joe Stirling (Open Society- Not Secret Society)

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
